ygData.subject: Battle at the CF
ygData.msgSnippet: (Good job so far Firefox, except Unitron and Firestarter both flew into the air and opened fire on the flame throwers beneath them with optic blasts. And two

(Good job so far Firefox, except Unitron and Firestarter both flew into the 
air and opened fire on the flame throwers beneath them with optic blasts.  

And two horn missiles Unitron fired into the main entry way of the CF drilled 
into the middle of the door and sent off a sonic wave designed to weaken the 
door at the molecular level.  Also, Demolition in the brig is trying to brake 
out, so you might want to find RoboRick's post with that in it.

Alloran, what is the Master and what's its status and location?)

The Oblitercons/The Protectobots/Demon Wulf/Flesh Ripper/Dark Claw/Beeline/
Sixshot/Ares/Double Punch/Manterror/Injector/Bumblebee/Minion/Chaos/Sun 
Crusher/Reflector/Scattershot/Nemesis Enforcer/Vehement/Firestarter/Unitron:



Dark One barrel rolled thorugh the air, avoiding all the laser blasts.  He 
fired down two energy-signature missiles down at Chromedome's midsection.

---

Breakdown rolled hard left, several blasts striking his relatively fresh 
armor.  He cursed, firing off a grenade from his launcher at Brainstorm's 
sternum, pulling his sonic blaster out of subspace and firing a sonic arc at 
Chromedome.

---

Pyro was still being pushed into the mud by Hot Spot's pressurized water, the 
Predacon now so deep in the mud the streams of acid didn't harm him.

---

Hiss felt the vapor strike him in the left shoulder, the joint starting to 
get slow.  He ducke down though, ten crystal shards digging into his chest.  
He fired 10 rapid optic blasts at Groove's chest and four fusion blasts from 
his cannon at Hardhead.

---

Scavenger raised his automatic rifle, firing twenty-five armor rounds from 
his chaingun at Highbrow.  He yelled out in pain as photon blasts into his 
pelvis, the robot falling to a knee in pain.

===

Hot Spot kept the pressure on Pyro, pushing him farther down.

---

Groove yelled out at the rapid optic blasts from his, knocking him back a few 
feet.  He cursed, firing more freezing vapor at Hiss' knees.

---

Blades let out a yell, gripping his thigh, not able to block the leaking.  He 
looked to First Aid and yelled out to him, but there was no response.  He 
crawled towards First Aid, Blades' scans showing his vital signs going down 
steadily.

---

First Aid lay in stasis lock, his spark losing energy rapidly.

---

Streetwise raised his rifle and charged forward firing two blasts at 
Scavenger's abdomen.

===

Demon Wulf growled as shields came online.  He was getting very upset.  He 
was thinking of reforming Dark Wolf since he and his brethren had reverted 
back to biped forms due to wanting to and not damage.

But he remembered the pain.  He looked towards Iron Raptor, transforming into 
his mutant wolf mode and headed off towards the Maximal leader.

---

Flesh Ripper watched his brother Demon Wulf head for Iron Raptor and knew it 
was only Wulf's fight.

He raised his left arm, a blue orb with a grenade like effect forming.  He 
threw the ball of energy at the CF, raising his rifle and firing off 4 blasts 
at the CF.

---

Dark Claw formed a whitish-yellow orb with an EMP like effect, throwing it at 
the CF.  He formed a black orb in his right hand, the orb having the effect 
of a few charges.  He threw it at the CF as hard as he could.

---

Chaos stopped, cursing as the shield came online.  "That's it..." he sighed, 
firing off two five-foot long missiles from two of his four missile tubes of 
his missile truck mode at the CF.

===

Beeline dived, firing off four optic blasts at Maximal missiles.

---

Double Punch flipped to the left with amazing acrobatics, several shots 
hitting him in the abdomen, almost knocking him over, landing on his feet.

He raised both arms, firing off two energy-signature seeking missiles from 
his left pincher at Torca, and two of the same from the other arm at 
Sideswipe.

He watched as the four missiles that were heading for him exploded because of 
Beeline's intervention.

---

Manterror was struck with Kluster's missile, knocking him out of the way of 
Grimmler Ratchet's shots.  Manterror let out a yellow throwing his arms in 
the air, firing three ion disks from his left arm at Kluster, three more from 
the other arm at Sky Lynx.

---

Injector flew to the left, avoiding the missile.  He returned fire with two 
stinger missiles at Sky Lynx.

---

Bumblebee pulled to the left, avoiding the missile and six shells, the two 
other explosive shells slashing into his armor, knocking him back.

He raised his left stinger missile launcher, firing off two stinger missiles 
at Ratchet, and two from the other launcher at Sky Lynx.

---

Sixshot sidestepped, five shells striking his chest.  He fell back in pain, 
the armor weak.  He raised his left arm, firing off four hypersonic 
concussion blasts from his blaster at Ratchet, and four of the same kind from 
his other weapon at Torca.

---

Ares fired off two rapid optic blasts, the remaining three shells getting 
through and knocking him back two feet, sending him slamming to his back.  He 
got up quickly, firing off a grenade at Torca.

---

Minion drove forward, firing a total of fifty explosive rounds off at Sky 
Lynx.  Twenty-five from his left cannon, another twenty-five from the cannon 
of his jeep mode on the opposite side.

"Learn when to fall fool!" he yelled out laughing.

---

He yelled out at the missile, flying through the air.  He regained his 
balance in the air, firing off twenty-five rapid optic blasts down at Torca.

---

Sun Crusher fired off four bolts of laser energy at Sideswipe from his rifle. 
 He trained his optics on Ratchet, firing three rapid blasts at the Maximal.
===

Nemesis stopped his movement, his body to low on energy, the boosters giving 
out.  He moved a few meters because of the initial inertia.  His scanners 
told him he was by the Oblitercons and nine other Maximal fools.  At least 
two were badly wounded.

He rolled onto his chest, crawling for First Aid and Blades.

---

Scattershot watched Iron Raptor.  He moved his head to the side ever so 
slightly, keeping his weapon trained on her.  He spotted Demon Wulf in his 
beast mode heading for them.

-He's stronger than me-

"Yes!  We had the whole thing planned from the beginning!  Prowl and Kluster 
are next!  Bwahahahahaha!  To bad you won't live long enough to find out 
about it!" he flew hard left away from Iron Raptor, gaining velocity and 
heading for the CF.  He'd leave the battle to Demon Wulf who was stronger 
than he.

===

Vehement heard the explosion of the missile he shot at Hysteria, his scanners 
telling him it hadn't been intercepted by anything.  He raised his right arm, 
firing off an energy-signature seeking missile through the ventalation system 
at Hysteria once again, ignoring the flame throwers and autoguns that were 
damaging his armor slightly.

---

Unitron fired up five rapid optic blasts at an autogun, getting annoyed.
He opened an encrypted Alliance comm. link to Demolition.

"This is Unitron, of the Alliance.  I and another are attempting to reach the 
brig.  Do what you can to break out by yourself.  Energy is weak and the 
Aut...Maximal craft is damaged significantly, energy is low no doubt.  
Especially now that they boosted up the shields again.  If there are any 
other robots in the brig free them.  Then make your way to the bridge.  We 
will meet you there and we will leave the base forcefully."

(Robo, there are three others in the brig, Imprisoner, Predator, and Choran)

---

Firestarter raised both arms, firing two missiles from the bottom of his left 
wrist at the door to the bridge, and two missiles at the door to the bridge 
from the other wrist.

"The shields are up..." he mumbled, not that interested in them.
